detail_desc: Fitted, long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck front and back and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the front and lined skirt.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and a flounce-trimmed V-neck at the front with a lace infill. Waist with a flounce trim at the front and elastication at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with ties.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Short dress in linen and viscose twill with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, concealed zip at the back and a seam with a decorative buckle at the waist. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with cable-knit sections on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.

An impregnating spray that protects your shoes against dirt and water. Scent-free and suitable for all materials. 200 ml. Instructions: Shake the bottle before use and apply to a clean, dry surface (test on a small patch beforehand). Spray the entire surface until moist and then allow to dry. For best results repeat after 30 minutes. Allow to dry for 24 hours.
Shorts in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed style with a slightly lower crotch, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Socks in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY) zip fly, front and back pockets and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, printed jersey with a mesh yoke and mesh sleeves. Unlined.
Faux fur gilet with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Satin lining.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, rib-knit alpaca blend with long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in a slightly stretchy weave with an A-line skirt. Narrow shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets.
Jersey off-the-shoulder dress with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Chelsea boots in soft. brogue-patterned leather with elastic gores in the sides, a loop front and back, and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud and detachable belt. Pleats at the front, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Trousers in a linen and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with and elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.

Shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with creases and an adjustable elasticated waist. Fake fly with a concealed press-stud, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Metal earrings decorated with small plastic beads. Length 3.7 cm. Width 1.9 cm.
Top in an airy jacquard-weave mulberry silk, linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend. Round, gathered neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front and short, wide sleeves.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.

Parka in fabric with a slight sheen. Lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front and a seam at the waist with a small frill at the sides. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
High-waisted tights that lift the bum and shape the waist and thighs. 30 denier.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
A pair of metal earrings.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a broderie anglaise collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and an additional longer layer in woven fabric at the hem.
Shorts in woven fabric with a paper bag waist and tie belt. Pleats at the front, a zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Fitted long-sleeved top in soft stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a wide lace-trimmed neck.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, short, cuffed balloon sleeves and a seam under the bust with narrow, detachable ties. Unlined.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads.
Cotton canvas trainers with hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with decorative buttons down the front and a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt. Concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in softly draping silk with a small stand-up collar, and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Straight, wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and zipped front pockets for safe storage of valuables. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes to help keep you warm while exercising outside. The sleeves are in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front,and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, sleeveless dress in lace with scalloped edges. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam with a band of hem-stitched embroidery at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining.

prod_name: AK Sonoma roll neck rib jersey
detail_desc: Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves. Overlocked edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
V-neck cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Studio Collection. Knee-length, pleated dress in airy organza that can be worn as an overdress, maybe with your favourite jeans. Deep V-neck with a pleated, flounced trim and a wide, billowing flounce at the front. Overdimensioned sleeves with a wide flounce that winds all the way down to the cuffs. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Jacket in washed denim with slightly worn details. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey made from a viscose blend with long sleeves. Unlined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Jersey T-shirt
Shorter top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short puff sleeves.
Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist and lined gusset.
Semi shiny tights that shape the tummy, thighs and calves while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 20 denier.
